title: • Approach
content:
Approach Designed for fun, built for performance, Approach is the best app for golfers from the 1st hole to the 19th.
View webste Coming soon
About I started golfing in highschool and was immediately hooked to the game. After a few years off the course, I brushed off my old clubs and got back into it. While clubs, tools, and styles had all evolved since high school, the apps “designed” for golf were ugly and clunky, to say the least.

Built fully in SwiftUI, this app was mostly designed and built in code — opening the door to intuitive and fluid interactions that take advantage of iOS.

The Approach logo takes inspiration from the varying flightpaths of a golf ball.

Round summaries provide a quick overview of your round, including a summary of your score, distance, and accuracy.

A custom in-round camera let’s you capture beautiful photos for your scorecards.

I built a first-of-it’s-kind, native rangefinder that pairs real-time location and elevation data to help golfers attack the pin.

A few of my favorite icons from the product.
